title: Emotions and Personality 2
sentences: I feel very frustrated because I don't understand this lesson.
You are a very optimistic person and you always see the good.
Don't be so pessimistic; I'm sure everything will turn out well.
por todo el trabajo que tengo.
Today I am stressed because of all the work I have.
Stay calm (keep the calm) and breathe deeply.
She is disappointed because her friends didn't come.
My aunt is very anxious and is always in a big hurry.
Sometimes I feel lonely in this big city.
Juan is a bit insecure about his own abilities.
I feel safe/secure when I walk through my neighborhood.
You are very creative and you make great drawings.
y paga el café de tu hermano.
Don't be stingy and pay for your brother's coffee.
Your room is always very tidy and clean.
Sorry, I am a bit messy with my papers.
He is a very intelligent boy and gets good grades.
Don't say silly/stupid things at the work meeting.
My cousin is very funny and always makes me laugh.
y casi no habla en clase.
He is very quiet and almost doesn't speak in class.
My dog is very loyal and always accompanies me.
The boy is very naughty and always breaks something.
al dar las gracias a todos.
You are very polite for thanking everyone.
That man was very rude to the waitress.
She is very sensitive and cries with movies.
You are a very responsible and punctual worker.
It is irresponsible to drive so fast around here.
You have to be strong in difficult moments.
I feel a bit weak because I haven't eaten anything.
y no habla de sus éxitos.
Juan is very modest and doesn't talk about his successes.
He/she is a very humble person despite being rich.
I like that you are always sincere with me.

Inseguro/a - Insecure

Tacaño/a - Stingy / Mean
Ordenado/a - Tidy / Organized
Desordenado/a - Messy / Disorganized
Inteligente - Intelligent
Tonto/a - Silly / Foolish
Gracioso/a - Funny
Callado/a - Quiet
Leal - Loyal
Travieso/a - Naughty / Mischievous
Educado/a - Polite / Well-behaved
Maleducado/a - Rude
Sensible - Sensitive
Responsable - Responsible
Irresponsable - Irresponsible
Fuerte - Strong
Débil - Weak

Humilde - Humble
Sincero/a - Sincere
